page.title: 17Gas Terminal Dalgety Bay.
page.content: In the early l98O's many residents of Dalgety Bay were worried by the proposed development of Shell/Esso's liquid gas terminal at Braefoot Bay. It was felt that the terminal would be an eyesore, the scenic view across the Forth would be spoiled by tankers waiting to berth at the terminal, there would be risk of explosion and widespread pollution. There was such strong feeling about the development that petitions were raised and some houses put up for sale. By siting the terminal to the north of Braefoot Point it cannot be seen from any point in Dalgety Bay. The terminal which is linked by pipeline to Shell/Esso's ethane cracking plant at Mossmorran was officially opened in the autumn of l984.
